author: Dmitry Bruso
comment: LG Watch Sport look awesome with your watch face. THX guys! you do your best

author: Bill Kennedy
comment: I like the look and how easy it is to read.  I would like to see the position of the month and day of the week switched, though.  I think it's more important to have the day of the week in large text, than to have the month show up there.

author: Evertson Croes
comment: Love the watchface. One nice new feature would be a setting that changes the color once a day.
title: Love it

author: Doni Furquim
comment: I don't understand certain things on screen that seems they have no function  just effects of color. It would be better if it were interactive.
title: Good!

author: kevin price
comment: Great face. Looks cool on the zenwatch 2

author: Patrick Young
comment: Nice and bright love the futuristic look, very cool ☆☆☆☆☆
title: Watch face neon

author: Jack Guo
comment: Great watch face. Looks really cool and info is shown well. My only criticism is that the sector view can only be used to show hours or months, both of which are fairly redundant since the same info can be seen by just looking at the time or date. I think a good use for this bar would be to show a timer counting down or to show seconds.  Update: I recently went on a flight and I found a slight issue with this. When the time is updated by the phone. The sector view is updated but the hour stays the same as before it received the update. So after a 2 hour time change my sector view was at 6 bars and the actual time shown was 4 o clock.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback! We will think about this feature and try to implement it soon.
Upd.: Hi! We actually know about this issue and working on it. Thanks for update.

author: Neil H
comment: Love it! One of the greats
